scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Holy Trinity seated on a golden crescent moon against a vibrant blue background filled with radiating gold lines. God the Father, with a long white beard, is in the center. To his left is a figure with a beard and long hair, possibly representing Adam or an Old Testament prophet, holding a golden orb. To God the Father's right is a youthful figure with blonde hair, likely representing Christ. All three figures are robed in pink and green garments, with blue tunics underneath adorned with gold patterns. Each figure has a golden halo. The overall composition suggests a divine and celestial setting.
